name: Java Tapper
description:
Java Tapper is a fun new twist on the original tapper style video game. Customers will come into your coffee house wanting either a donut, a breakfast sandwich or a coffee. Click up and down the three aisles to serve them the type of food that they want before they reach the end. You'll be fired if you forget to pick up a tip or break a plate by serving it down an aisle without an eagerly waiting customer!

How To Play:

  1. Click on an aisle to move your server.
  2. Send the customer the item in their bubble by clicking the food/drink icon on the right.
  3. Pick up the payment that the customer sends back.

Keys:

  1. Move the server: Up / Down or W / S or Mouse Click
  2. Dispense Item:
    • 1: Coffee
    • 2: Breakfast
    • 3: Donut
      1. Menu/Pause: Escape
